<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104335</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104335</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101314</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dawn, Mission to the Asteroid Belt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dämmerung, Mission zum Asteroidengürtel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aube, mission à la ceinture en forme d'étoile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alvorecer, missão à correia asteroid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alba, missione alla cinghia a forma di stella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Δαων, αποστολή στην αστεροειδή ζώνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Amanecer, misión en la correa asteroid</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">NASA's Dawn mission is getting ready to launch on an unprecedented tour of two residents of the asteroid belt. This mission will be the first to orbit two different bodies in our solar system. For more information see: http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/dawn/dawn20070626/</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dämmerungmission der NASAS wird fertig, auf eine 
beispiellose Tour von zwei Bewohnern des Asteroidengürtels 
auszustoßen. Diese Mission ist die erste, zum von von zwei 
unterschiedlichen Körpern in unserem Solarsystem in Umlauf zu 
bringen. Zu mehr Information sehen Sie: 
http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/dawn/dawn20070626/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La mission de l'aube de la NASA est prête pour 
lancer en excursion sans précédent de deux résidants de la ceinture
en forme d'étoile. Cette mission sera la première pour 
satelliser deux corps différents dans notre système solaire. 
Pour plus d'information voyez : 
http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/dawn/dawn20070626/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A missão do alvorecer da NASA está começando 
pronta para lançar-se em uma excursão unprecedented de dois 
residentes da correia asteroid. Esta missão será a primeira 
para orbitar dois corpos diferentes em nosso sistema solar. Para
mais informação veja: 
http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/dawn/dawn20070626/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La missione di alba della NASA sta ottenendo 
aspetta per lanciare durante un giro senza precedente di due 
residenti della cinghia a forma di stella. Questa missione sarà
la prima per orbitare intorno a due corpi differenti nel nostro 
sistema solare. Per le più informazioni veda: 
http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/dawn/dawn20070626/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αποστολή της Dawn της NASA παίρνει 
αναμένει για να προωθήσει σε έναν πρωτοφανή γύρο δύο 
κατοίκων της αστεροειδούς ζώνης. Αυτή η αποστολή θα είναι 
η πρώτη για να βάλει δύο διαφορετικούς οργανισμούς στο ηλιακό 
σύστημά μας σε τροχιά. Για περισσότερες πληροφορίες 
δείτε: http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/dawn/dawn20070626/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La misión del amanecer de la NASA está 
consiguiendo lista lanzar en un viaje sin precedente de dos residentes
de la correa asteroid. Esta misión será la primera para mover 
en órbita alrededor de dos diversos cuerpos en nuestra Sistema Solar.
Para más información vea: 
http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/dawn/dawn20070626/</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101314</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104335</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

      <location>
